artist: Etcher: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully; Designer: Francois Hubert Drouais
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
description: two little boys wearing large hats and long coats in a rocky landscape, accompanied by dog; boy on R unlocks a box on which he rests his proper R arm; inscription below
signed: LLC, in the plate: [Drouais pinx.]; LRC below the image, in the plate: [A.L. De Lalive. Sculps.]
title: Marie Gabriel Comte de Choiseuil et Michel Felix Chevalier de Choiseuil, no. 54, from a recueil of etchings
